Parameters: GestureDescription.StrokeDescription: the stroke to add. This value must never be null.
addStroke(android.accessibilityservice.G.Description: Add a stroke to the gesture description. Up to @B_android#accessibilityservice#GestureDescription#getMaxStrokeCount_E@ paths may be added to a gesture, and the total gesture duration (earliest path start time to latest path end time) may not exceed @B_android#accessibilityservice#GestureDescription#getMaxGestureDuration_E@.
